languages.text: "Приношу свои извинения. Я был немного занят, пытаясь одновременно разобраться с дюжиной мятежей и двумя дюжинами ксеновторжений, а также убедить власть предержащих Простора на время разжать челюсти на глотках друг друга, чтобы выслушать голос разума. Зная вашу экстравагантную манеру общения, я предпочел отложить нашу встречу до момента, когда держать руки подальше от оружия уже не будет таким испытанием для меня".

"I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."
languages.original_text: "Приношу свои извинения. Я был немного занят, пытаясь одновременно разобраться с дюжиной мятежей и двумя дюжинами ксеновторжений, а также убедить власть предержащих Простора на время разжать челюсти на глотках друг друга, чтобы выслушать голос разума. Зная вашу экстравагантную манеру общения, я предпочел отложить нашу встречу до момента, когда держать руки подальше от оружия уже не будет таким испытанием для меня".

languages.text: “我得向你道歉，我这段时间一直都有点太忙了。我一边要处理十几场暴乱与几十次异形入侵，一边又要努力说服科罗努斯扩区的各大当权者不要继续剑拔弩张，应当稍微坐下来谈一谈。我很熟悉你们那种奢侈的交流方式，因此，我觉得这件事情最好还是等等。等到哪怕我松开武器也不会有危险的时候，我再与你进行一次正式的会谈。”
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."

traits.locale_text: “我得向你道歉，我这段时间一直都有点太忙了。我一边要处理十几场暴乱与几十次异形入侵，一边又要努力说服科罗努斯扩区的各大当权者不要继续剑拔弩张，应当稍微坐下来谈一谈。我很熟悉你们那种奢侈的交流方式，因此，我觉得这件事情最好还是等等。等到什么时候，哪怕我松开武器也不会有危险的时候，我再与你进行一次正式的会面。”

languages.text: «Debo disculparme. He estado un tanto ocupado con la resolución una docena de revueltas y una veintena de incursiones xenos, a la vez que intento que las autoridades de la Extensión dejen de intentar matarse entre ellas el tiempo suficiente como para atender a razones. Al conocer lo extravagante de su forma de hablar, consideré que lo mejor sería posponer nuestro encuentro hasta un momento en el que no fuera tan difícil mantener la mano lejos del arma».
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."

traits.locale_text: «Debo disculparme. He estado un tanto ocupado con la resolución una docena de revueltas y una veintena de incursiones xenos, a la vez que intento que las autoridades de la Extensión dejen de intentar matarse entre ellas el tiempo suficiente como para atender a razones. Al conocer lo extravagante de su forma de hablar, consideré que lo mejor sería posponer nuestro encuentro hasta un momento en el que no fuera tan difícil mantener la mano lejos del arma».

languages.text: 「謝罪しよう。10件余りの反乱と20件少々の異種族による侵略に対処中で、少々気をとられていたのだ。その上、エクスパンスに存在する勢力に対し、互いの喉元から顎を離して理性的に考えられるだけの距離を置くよう説得を試みているのだ。お前は極端なやり方で意思疎通を図ると知っている。そこで武器に手を触れずにいるのがそこまで苦にならない時間になるまで、この話し合いを延期するのが最善と考えたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."

traits.locale_text: 「謝罪しよう。10件余りの反乱と20件少々の異種族による侵略に対処中で、少々気をとられていたのだ。その上、エクスパンスに存在する勢力に対し、互いの喉元から顎を離して理性的に考えられるだけの距離を置くよう説得を試みているのだ。お前は極端なやり方で意思疎通を図ると知っている。そこで武器に手を触れずにいるのがそこまで苦にならない時間になるまで、この話し合いを延期するのが最善と考えたのだ」

languages.text: « Je vous présente toutes mes excuses. Je suis quelque peu préoccupé, car je tente actuellement d'étouffer une dizaine de révoltes et de repousser le double d'assauts des xénos, tout en essayant de convaincre les autorités des Étendues de cesser de se sauter à la gorge assez longtemps pour entendre raison. Connaissant vos méthodes de communication inhabituelles, je me suis dit qu'il valait mieux repousser notre rendez-vous à un moment de la journée où je serais moins tenté d'empoigner une arme. »
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."

Connaissant vos méthodes de communication inhabituelles, je me suis dit qu'il valait mieux repousser notre rendez-vous à un moment de la journée où je serais moins tenté d'empoigner une arme. »

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Entschuldigung. Ich bin ziemlich beschäftigt, muss ich mich doch um ein Dutzend Aufstände und zwei Dutzend Xenos-Überfälle kümmern, während ich gleichzeitig versuche, die Machthaber der Ausdehnung dazu zu bewegen, ihren Biss in die Kehlen der jeweils anderen kurz zu lockern und zur Vernunft zu kommen. Da ich mit Eurer extravaganten Kommunikationsmethode vertraut bin, hielt ich es für das Beste, unser Treffen zu verzögern, bis es mir nicht ganz so schwerfällt, meine Hände von der Waffe zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."

languages.text: "Çok özür dilerim. On kadar isyan ve yirmi kadar zeno istilasıyla uğraşmakla meşguldüm. Öte taraftan Enginlik'teki güç odaklarını birbirleriyle boğuşmaya biraz ara verip laf dinlemeye davet ediyordum. Senin müfrit iletişim yöntemlerini bildiğimden görüşmemizi, elimde silah olmayan bir vakte ertelemekle hata etmeyeceğimi düşündüm."
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies. I have been slightly preoccupied, attempting as I am to deal with a dozen uprisings and two dozen xeno-incursions, while also trying to convince the powers that be in the Expanse to unlock their jaws from around each other's throats long enough to listen to reason. Being familiar with your extravagant mode of communication, I thought it best to delay our meeting until a time when keeping my hands off a weapon would not be so great a trial."
